definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: dian4 lan3 tiao2 zhi4 jie3 tiao2 qi4

sentences.english: Variable capacitor soldering joints made with RG213 coaxial braid.
sentences.chinese: 可变电容器的焊点与RG213同轴电缆编织的连接。

sentences.english: Each new combination of cable and attachment configuration shall be cross sectioned using this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 每个新的组合电缆和附属装置都应该通过此程序横截。

sentences.english: The box can be used for both cable and steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 接线箱结构形式分电缆布线和钢管布线两种。

sentences.english: The system use public-wire structure and one cable can connect all station.
sentences.chinese: 系统采用共线式结构，一根电缆可连接所有话站。

sentences.english: Generally power cables laid in a special cable tunnel or in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 电力电缆一般是敷设于专门的电缆隧道和土壤中。

sentences.english: Generally power cables laid in a special cable tunnel or in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 电力电缆一般是敷设于专门的电缆隧道和土壤中。

sentences.english: This consists of a Cable and Apricorn cloning software.
sentences.chinese: 这包括一个小菜一碟电缆和克隆软件。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 阐明对核电厂1E级电缆核安全审查的基本要求。

sentences.english: The unit shall be equipped with a standard 120V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 这种热水器应该配置一个标准的120伏插头电缆。

sentences.english: Model LCV is part of the connecting cable of the force transmitter.
sentences.chinese: LCV型放大器是力传递装置连接电缆的一部分。

sentences.english: So, let’s recap. How close are these cables to the ground, again?
sentences.chinese: 关键是这些电缆离地面太近了，还想下一次被切断吗？

sentences.english: Convenient cable organizer keeps cables tangle-free.
sentences.chinese: 方便的电缆电线缠结组织者保持免费。

sentences.english: Coax mapping with up to eight color coded coax remotes.
sentences.chinese: 同轴电缆采用了8个彩色编码同轴电缆遥控映射。

sentences.english: The third one was about building submarine cable tunnel.
